titles.title: SF401 Come, sinners to the gospel feast

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, sinners, to the gospel feast,
Let every soul be Jesu's guest;
You need not one be left behind,
For God has called all humankind.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sent by my Lord, on you I call,
The invitation is to all;
Come, all the world; and witness how
all things in Christ are ready now.
.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come, all ye souls by sin oppressed,
Ye restless wanderers after rest,
Ye poor, and maimed, and sick and blind,
In Christ a hearty welcome find.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines:
See him set forth before your eyes;
Behold the bleeding sacrifice!
His offered benefits embrace,
And freely now be saved by grace.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
This is the time; no more delay!
This is the Lord's accepted day;
Come in, this moment, at his call,
And live for him who died for all.
